Paragraph: It is also understood that the 3-fold higher chargecarrier mobility of PTATDPP than that of PTAFDPP arises from its stronger π-π stacking with a shorter d 010 , as discussed above.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "3-fold higher chargecarrier mobility," "stronger π-π stacking," and "a shorter d 010." These entities are specific properties or characteristics mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 3-fold higher chargecarrier mobility |
| stronger π-π stacking |
| a shorter d 010 |

After reviewing the paragraph, all of the entities can be considered as values of material properties. "3-fold higher chargecarrier mobility" refers to the mobility of charge carriers, which is a material property. "Stronger π-π stacking" is a property that describes the interaction between π orbitals in a material. "A shorter d 010" is a property that refers to the distance between layers in a material. Therefore, all of these entities can be considered as values of material properties.
